summary: A new highway threatens a Chicago neighborhood, so to protest the residents throw a block party.
cast: Yaphet Kotto|Kirk Calloway|Thomas Carter|Donn Carl Harper|Lynn Caridine|Patricia McCaskill|Lynn Harris|Rudy Ray Moore|Rosalind Cash|Randy Brooks|Debbi Morgan|Fuddle Bagley|Frank Rice|Carl W. title: La estafa
